start_text:
ğŸ¤– Welcome to the MVÄŒR application status bot! ğŸ¤–

ğŸ”„ This bot will check your application every {refresh_period} minutes and notify you of any changes.
ğŸ“Œ Start tracking your application with the /subscribe command.
ğŸ” Want the current status? Use the /status command.
ğŸš€ Need a quick update? Use the /force_refresh command. But remember, you can only use this twice a day! â°
ğŸŒ Use /lang to change bot language
âŒ Done tracking? Use the /unsubscribe command to stop updates.

***
ğŸ•°ï¸ If you've been waiting for your application results for over 60 days, it might be time to take action!
ğŸ”— File a Complaint Here: https://ciziproblem.cz/necinnost_Nin1

subscribe_intro: ğŸ‘‡ Please hit the button below to subscribe to your application status updates.
max_subscriptions_reached: ğŸ”’ You have reached the maximum number of subscriptions. Please unsubscribe from one of your applications before subscribing to another.
unsubscribe_failed: ğŸ˜“ Oops! Failed to unsubscribe, please try again in a bit.
select_unsubscribe: âŒ Please select the application you want to unsubscribe from:
select_status: ğŸ”„ Please select the application you want to get the status of:
select_refresh: ğŸš€ Please select the application you want to refresh:
failed_to_refresh: Failed to retrieve user data. Please try again later.
ratelimit_exceeded: Sorry, you can only use this command 2 times a day.
application_updated: Your application status has been updated!
application_failed: ğŸ˜¥Unfortunately, we couldn't get the status of {app_string} application. Please ensure your application details are correct and try unsubscribing and then subscribing again. If the issue persists, you can reach out to developers.
current_status_empty: Current status is empty. Please wait some time and try again.
cizi_problem_promo: Waiting for more than 60 days? ğŸ¤” Maybe it's time to file a complaint ğŸ“
dialog_app_number: Hey there!ğŸ‘‹ Let's get started. Please take a look at your ÄŒÃ­slo JednacÃ­, or Ä. j ğŸ”¢ Can you tell me all numbers after "OAM-" but before "/ XX-2023"? Like in OAM-12345-6/TP-2023, it's 12345-6.
dialog_type: Now, please chose your application typeğŸ“„:
dialog_confirmation: Alright, your application is OAM-{number}-{suffix}/{type}-{year}. Is this correct?ğŸ¤”
dialog_confirmation_no_suffix: Alright, your application is OAM-{number}/{type}-{year}. Is this correct?ğŸ¤”
dialog_cancel: No worries! You can always start over by using the /subscribe command.
error_invalid_number: Oops! ğŸ™ˆ That doesn't seem like a valid application number. Let's try again. Remember, it's all numbers after "OAM-" but before "/ XX-2023"
error_subscribe: ğŸ˜” Sorry, something went wrong while trying to subscribe you. Please give it another shot in a bit. If the issue persists, feel free to contact developers.
error_generic: ğŸ˜“ Oops! Something didn't go quite right. Please try again later. If the issue keeps popping up, feel free to contact developers.
dialog_completion: Fantastic! ğŸŒŸ You're all set up. I'll keep you posted with updates related to your application!
unknown_command: ğŸ¤” Sorry, I don't know this command.
unknown_input: You wanted something?ğŸ˜Š Please tap on /help to get the list of available commands
unknown_input_funny: This command is unknown to me, <s>you visaless bag of flesh</s>
